enable.label: Enable Custom Ordering Process
enable.comment: Allows you to create an order first and assign or add a customer after.

change_order_state.label: Enable Change Order State
change_order_state.comment: Warning! Do not change the order state (not status!) if you are not confident in their actions

recalculate_shipping.label: Recalculate Shipping Amount
recalculate_shipping.comment: Automatically recalculate shipping amount after updating items

is_visible_comment_on_front.label: Comment is Visible in Customer Account
is_visible_comment_on_front.comment: Manage if comments for an order are visible to customers on front-end

deferred_re_authorization.label: Re-Authorize Payment Automatically
deferred_re_authorization.comment: If yes, then payment will be re-authorized automatically if the order's total increases after changes. If no, then you can manually select when to re-authorize payment.

return_to_stock.label: Return Item To Stock
return_to_stock.comment: Automatically return item to stock once removed from order

show_item_image.label: Show Ordered Item Image
show_item_image.comment: Show product images for items ordered on order view page

validate_inventory.label: Validate Inventory
validate_inventory.comment: Validate stock QTY when editing the QTY ordered for an item

enable_edit_coupon.label: Enable Edit Coupon Code
enable_edit_coupon.comment: Allow coupon code for existing order to be edited

enable_custom_amount.label: Enable Custom Amount
enable_custom_amount.comment: Allow custom amount to be added to order

enable_custom_amount_new.label: Enable Custom Amount on Order Creation
enable_custom_amount_new.comment: Allow custom amount to be added during checkout by admin

display_custom_amount.label: Display Custom Amount
display_custom_amount.comment: Orders, Invoices, Credit Memos Display Settings

confirm_transaction_email_guest.label: Confirm Edit Order Email For Guest

confirm_wait_status.label: Order Status - Wait Confirmation
confirm_wait_status.comment: Change order status when order is waiting for confirmation

confirm_success_status.label: Order Status - Confirmed
confirm_success_status.comment: Change order status when order is confirmed

confirm_cancel_status.label: Order Status - Canceled
confirm_cancel_status.comment: Change order status when confirmation is canceled

transaction_email_guest.label: Edit Ordered Items Notification For Guest

confirm_edit_checked.label: Auto Check "Confirm Edit" Checkbox
confirm_edit_checked.comment: If Yes, the checkbox for "Confirm Edit" will automatically be checked anytime you go to make an edit

notify_checked.label: Auto Check "Notify Customer" Checkbox
notify_checked.comment: If Yes, the checkbox for "Notify Customer" will automatically be checked anytime you go to make an edit

recalculate_amount_checked.label: Auto Check "Recalculate Order Amount" Checkbox
recalculate_amount_checked.comment: If Yes, the checkbox for "Recalculate Order Amount" will automatically be checked anytime you go to make an edit

hide.label: Allow Hide Order On Front
hide.comment: Allow hide order from customer view in "My Account" area

auto_archive_after_days.label: Archive After X Days
auto_archive_after_days.comment: Automatically archive orders created after X days</br>

auto_archive_start_time.label: Archive Start Time
auto_archive_start_time.comment: Control the exact time orders will be added to archive

run_archive_manually.label: Run Manually
run_archive_manually.comment: Select to run archive manually by selecting the Archive All button

save_grid_params.label: Save Order Table Params
save_grid_params.comment: Save parameters (filters, sorting, rows per page) of order table for next login. Separate for each admin.

columns.label: Order Table Columns
columns.comment:
Select and arrange order of columns to display order information.
Options in the left column will appear on the Order Table once saved.
Manage table columns width in pixels (Note: width of column can be ignored in some cases).

fix_table_header.label: Fix Table Header
fix_table_header.comment: Anchor the header when scrolling down the page

orders_grid_columns.label: Customer Orders Table
orders_grid_columns.comment: Rearrange, remove, or add columns to the orders grid that can be seen in the customers' account in Magento admin panel.

resent_orders_grid_columns.label: Customer Recent Orders Table
resent_orders_grid_columns.comment: Rearrange, remove, or add columns to the recent orders grid that can be seen in the customers' account in Magento admin panel.

resent_orders_count.label: Recent Orders Count
resent_orders_count.comment: Specify the number of recent orders to show to the customer by default

allow_del_orders.label: Enable
allow_del_orders.comment: Related invoices, shipments and credit memos will also be deleted

delete_downloadable.label: Delete Downloadable Products
delete_downloadable.comment: Delete downloadable products after deleting an order

allow_del_related_cm_for_invoices.label: Allow Deletion Of Related Credit Memos
allow_del_related_cm_for_invoices.comment: If Yes, credit memos related to deleted invoice will also be deleted

double_confirmation.label: Double Confirmation
double_confirmation.comment: Double confirmation before delete credit memos

creditmemo_status.label: Credit Memos Statuses
creditmemo_status.comment: Delete credit memos only with status(es)

standard.label: Use Standard Authorize.net
standard.comment: Choose to either enter account credentials or use existing account configured in Authorize.Net payment method area

limit_period.label: Limit Period
limit_period.comment: Choose to limit the date range the report automatically displays

last_days.label: Show Last "X" Days
last_days.comment: If limiting the report period, then enter the amount of days to limit the report by

enable.label: Enable
enable.comment: If yes, specify frequency on automatically generating the report and emailing to the specified recipients

start_time.label: Start Time
start_time.comment: Send emails every day at this time

transaction_email.label: Email Template
transaction_email.comment: Select the email template used to deliver the report via email

from_email.label: From Email
from_email.comment: Enter the email address sending the report

to_emails.label: To Email
to_emails.comment: Enter email addresses that will be used as default recipients of the email. Separate emails with a comma. When sending the report you can remove these emails or add additional emails if needed.
